space.arim.api.server.sponge

Class SpongeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.api.server.sponge.SpongeUtil

  • public final class SpongeUtil
extends Object
    Basic Sponge utility class with more methods added via contribution.
    Author:
    A248

    • Method Summary

      static org.spongepowered.api.text.Text colour(String colourable)
      Adds colour to a message according to '&' colour codes.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerNameTabComplete

        public static List<String> getPlayerNameTabComplete(String[] args,
                                                    org.spongepowered.api.Server server)
        Iterates across online players, finds players matching the first argument, and returns applicable player names in alphabetical order.
        Parameters:
        args - command arguments to tab complete
        server - the server, use Sponge.getServer() for this parameter
        Returns:
        a list per the Sponge API

      • colour

        public static org.spongepowered.api.text.Text colour(String colourable)
        Adds colour to a message according to '&' colour codes.
        See ChatUtil.colourSponge(String) for more information.
        Parameters:
        colourable - the input string
        Returns:
        a coloured Text object

      • stripColour

        public static String stripColour(String colourable)
        Removes colour from a message according to '&' colour codes.
        See ChatUtil.stripColour(String) for more information.
        Parameters:
        colourable - the input string
        Returns:
        an uncoloured string

      • parseJson

        public static org.spongepowered.api.text.Text parseJson(String jsonable)
        Parses Json messages based on RezzedUp's json.sk format.

        Example usage: 
         
 public void sendJsonMessage(Player player, String json) {
   // Woohoo! Now we can send json messages!
   player.sendMessage(SpongeUtil.parseJson(json));
 }
        See ChatUtil.parseJsonSponge(String) for more information.
        Parameters:
        jsonable - the input string
        Returns:
        a formatted Text object

      • parseColouredJson

        public static org.spongepowered.api.text.Text parseColouredJson(String jsonable)
        Parses Json messages based on RezzedUp's json.sk format.
        Differs from parseJson(String) in that this assumes the string is already coloured.
        Parameters:
        jsonable - the input string
        Returns:
        a formatted Text object

      • stripJson

        public static String stripJson(String json)
        Removes json formatting from an input string.
        Useful for sending messages to the console with formatting removed.
        See ChatUtil.stripJson(String) for more information.
        Parameters:
        json - the input string
        Returns:
        a string stripped of all json tags
